committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide for the coinage and issuance of coins to commemorate the bicentennial of the Americans Revolution.

summary.text: Provides for the coinage and issuance of both gold and silver coins by the Secretary of the Treasury to commemorate the bicentennial of the American Revolution.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the coinage and issuance of coins to commemorate the bicentennial of the Americans Revolution.
